00020 #ifndef __TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_H__
00021 #define __TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_H__
00022 
00023 namespace tlm {
00024 
00025 class tlm_debug_payload
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     // Start address of the transaction:
00029     sc_dt::uint64 address;
00030     
00031     // Indication of a read or write access:
00032     bool do_read;
00033     
00034     // Number of bytes to transfer:
00035     unsigned int num_bytes;
00036     
00037     // Pointer to the data array. Note that the data is always
00038     // organized in the endianness of the host machine (like
00039     // the data pointer in the generic payload):
00040     unsigned char* data;
00041 };
00042 
00043 } // namespace tlm

00045 #endif /* __TLM_DEBUG_PAYLOAD_H__ */
